unique_passive.description: Basic attacks will deal 9% of the target's current HP as additional physical damage (up to 60 against creeps and minions).
Each Basic Attack grants 3% Physical Lifesteal for 3s. Stack up to 5 times.
Each time a Basic Attack deals damage to enemies, reduces the target's Movement Speed by 8% (halved for ranged Basic Attacks) for 1.5s. Stacking up to 5 times.
When each Basic Attack deals damage to enemies, increase Attack Speed by 8%. Stacks up to 5 times. Lasts 3s.
Unable to increase critical chance. Every 1% of critical chance gained will increase attack speed by 1%.
After every 2 non-critical Basic Attacks. Attack Speed of the next Basic Attack is increased by 100% and its effects is triggered an extra 2 time(s).

active.description: Immune to all Physical Damage. Last 2s. (Duration becomes half when used by non-marksmen). CD 70s.

unique_passive.description: null
null

data.summary: The longer it fights, the stronger it gets.

unique_passive.description: Dealing damage to enemies grants 9 Physical Attack and 3 Physical Penetration per second for 3s, to a max of 8 stacks (Marksmen/Mages/Supports only receive 33% of these stacked effects); also grants 15% Movement Speed at full stacks.
Each point of the enemy's Physical Defense increases Physical Penetration by 0.05% when dealing damage to it, capped at 20%
When HP drops below 40%, the hero will receive an extra 15% Physical Lifesteal.
Crit hit will increase the hero's Physical Attack by 5% for 2s.
In 3s after using the skill, the caster's next Basic Attack will deal additional True Damage as much as 60% of Physical Attack with a cooldown of 1.5s.
When Divine Justice's effect is triggered, it will increase the hero's movement speed 10%.
Every 5-3s (decreases as Attack Speed increases), the next Basic Attack deals 150-362 Magic Damage to up to 3 enemies (can critically strike and deals 200% damage against minions).
Each time Typhoon is cast, one's movement speed will be increased 5% for a short time.
Crit hits increase the hero's ATK Speed by 30% and Crit Chance by 5%. Lasts 2s.
If no damage is taken or dealt within 5s, next Basic Attack will deal extra Physical Damage equal to 160 plus 40% of Physical Attack and inflict 40% slow effects upon the target for 1.5s.
Attacking enemy units that have HP below 50% will increase hero's Physical Attack by 25%. Lasts 2s. (Takes affect before damage is dealt)
Deals damage to an enemy hero or creep 5 times in a row and increases Movement Speed by 50% that decays rapidly over 3s. This efect has a 8s cooldown.
null
null
Once the hero's HP falls below 30%, gains a 510~1350 shield (scales with level) and 25 extra Magic Defense for 3s. Cooldown: 40s.
Upon dealing damage to the target, reduces Shield and HP Regen of the target by 50% for 3s.
null

When struck by a Basic Attack, deals Physical Damage equal to 25% of the incoming damage (calculated before Damage Reduction) plus 25% of the hero's Physical Defense to the attacker and slows them by 15% for 1s.
null
Reduces damage taken 20% when health is less than 40% and increases your Spell Vamp by 35% for 5s. This effect has a cooldown of 60s.
null

In 3s after using the skill, the caster's next Basic Attack will deal True Damage as much as 50 plus 5% of the caster's Extra Max HP to the enemy target and surrounding units and slow them by 40-80% (increases with the caster's Extra Max HP) for 1s. This effect has a 1.5s cooldown.
null
Deals Magic Damage equal to 1.5% of hero's Max HP per second to nearby enemies. This damage is increased by 100% against minions.
Regenerates 2.5% Max HP per second (reduced to 0.5% Max HP per second over 5s after taking damage).
When hit by an enemy hero's skill, reduces their Physical ATK by 8% for 2s (up to 3 stacks).
null
Raises shield abosorption and HP regeneration effect by 30%.

Can be triggered when taking Magic Damage. Reduces Magic Damage taken by 25% for 5s (including the Magic Damage that triggers this effect). You will be able to trigger this effect again after leaving combat for 10s.
Reduces the Shield and HP Regen of nearby enemy heroes by 50% (excluding those affected by 'Life Drain'), and their Attack Speed by 30%.
Resurrect in 2.5s after death and gets 16% HP and 220-1200 shield that lasts for 3s. (Scales with hero level). This effect has a CD of 210s.
Casting a skill or using Basic Attacks will increase Movement Speed by 2%, Physical & Magic Defense by 4. Lasts 4s. Stacks up to 5 times.
Every 2s, the next attack deals extra Magic Damage equal to 20 plus 5% of the hero's Extra HP
Increases own Magic Damage Reduction by 3-10 upon taking Magic Damage (scales with level), lasting for 3s and stacking up to 6 times.
null

active.description: Retribution damage dealt to creeps or minions is inceased to 150%. Can be used against heroes, dealing 100 True Damage and absorbing 52-80 Physical Attack and Magic Power from the target over 5s (scales with level). Only when total creep kills, hero kills, or hero kill assists reach 5 can Retribution be upgraded.

active.description: Retribution damage dealt to creeps or minions is increased to 150%. Can be used against heroes, dealing 100 True Damage and absorbing 72-100 Movement Speed from the target over 5s (scales with level). Only when total creep kills, hero kills, or hero kill assists reach 5 can Retribution be upgraded.

active.description: Damage against minions or creeps is increased to 150%. Can be cast on enemy heroes, dealing 100 True Damage and absorbing HP equal to 250 plus 25% of the caster's extra HP from the target over 5s. Only when total creep kills, hero kills, or hero kill assists reach 5 can Retribution be upgraded.

Regenerates 15% of Max Mana every 10s in total.
Max CD Reduction increased by 5%.

active.description: Freeze upon using. The hero can't do anything but will be immune to all DMG and debuff. Last 2s, CD 100s

Increase magic attack by 21%-35% (Scales with level).
Kill enemy hero to recover HP by 10%.

Skill Damage will burn the targets for 3s, dealing 1% of the target's Max HP as Magic Damage per second (damaging the same target multiple times within a short duration can increase this damage to 2% at most), 10 damage minimum
In 3s after using the skill, the casters next Basic Attack will deal additional True Damage as much as 120% of Magic Power with a cooldown of 1.5s. Then briefly gains 10% Movement Speed
Time: Adds 25 HP and 4 Magic Power every 20s. Up to 12 times
If Time reaches Max, then the hero will receive extra 5% Magic Power and 300 Mana.
Gain a Shield equal to 200% Magic Power. Gain another after 30s when it breaks.
Hero kills or assists reduce Ultimate's current cooldown by 30%.

Every 6s, the next skill echoes, dealing 20-1000 Magic Damage (scales with the hero's Max Mana) to up to 3 enemies
Dealing damage to enemy heroes will reduce their Magic Defense by 2~9 for 2s (the Defense reduction scales with level). Stacks up to 3 times

For each Basic Attack received, gains 5 extra Physical Defense (up to 25) for 3s.
Duration of being controlled reduced by 30%

Restores 10% Max Mana on hero kills or assists and 4% on minion kills.

active.description: Conceals nearby allied heroes and increases their Movement Speed by 30%-75% (scales with Gold from Thriving) for 5s or until they deal or take damage.

passive.description: After purchase, you can no longer gain Gold and EXP from minions and creeps and must collect 600 Gold from Roaming Equipment to unlock this skill (up to 1500 Gold).

passive.description: Increases nearby allied heroes' Physical Attack and Magic Power by 12-30 (scales with Gold from Thriving) and Attack and Movement Speed by 15%.
After purchase, you can no longer gain Gold and EXP from minions and creeps and must collect 600 Gold from Roaming Equipment to unlock this skill (up to 1500 Gold).

passive.description: Every 10s, the next healing or shield skill restores an extra 300-750 HP (scales with Gold from Thriving) for the allied hero with the lowest HP within 5 yards. Skills that only take effect on self cannot trigger this effect.
After purchase, you can no longer gain Gold and EXP from minions and creeps and must collect 600 Gold from Roaming Equipment to unlock this skill (up to 1500 Gold).

After purchase, you can no longer gain Gold and EXP from minions and creeps and must collect 600 Gold from Roaming Equipment to unlock this skill (up to 1500 Gold).
